Package user

Class Staff

  • Object
    • User
      • Staff
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class Staff
extends User
    Represents a staff in the system. A staff can interact with the various camp, enquiries, registration and suggestions databases.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private IGetCampsCreated listCampsStaffCreatedGetter
      This Staff's interface that it utilises to create a list of camp names that were created by him.
      private ICreateCamp staffCampCreator
      This Staff's interface it utilises to create a camp.
      private IDeleteCamp staffCampDeleter
      This Staff's interface it utilises to delete a camp.
      private IEditCamp staffCampEditor
      This Staff's interface it utilises to edit a camp.
      private IGeneratePerformanceReport staffPerformanceReportGenerator
      This Staff's interface it utilises to generate a performance report for all camp committee members of camps that this staff created.
      private IGenerateStudentReport staffStudentReportGenerator
      This Staff's interface it utilises to generate a student report for all camps that he is in charge of.
      private IViewOwnCamps staffViewOwnCamps
      This Staff's interface it utilises to view all camps that he can see.

      • Fields inherited from class User

        email, password, userID

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Staff​(String name, String email, Faculty faculty, ICreateCamp staffCampCreator, IDeleteCamp staffCampDeleter, IEditCamp staffCampEditor, IViewAllCamps staffViewAllCamps, IViewOwnCamps staffViewOwnCamps, ISortCamps iSortCamps, IFilterCamps iFilterCamps, IGenerateStudentReport staffStudentReportGenerator, IGetCampsCreated listCampsStaffCreatedGetter, DataList dataList, IGeneratePerformanceReport staffPerformanceReportGenerator)
      Creates a new Staff object, with the given name, associated user database, and interfaces it requires from CampDataBase and RegistrationDataBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeAttendeeSlots​(String campName, int newAttendeeSlots)
      Changes the total attendee slots of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeCampComSlots​(String campName, int newCampComSlots)
      Changes the number of total camp committee slots of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeCampName​(String campName, String newCampName)
      Changes the camp name of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeDescription​(String campName, String newDescription)
      Changes the description of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeEndDate​(String campName, String newEndDate)
      Changes the end date of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeLocation​(String campName, String newLocation)
      Changes the location of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeRegClosingDate​(String campName, String newRegClosingDate)
      Changes the registration closing date of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeStartDate​(String campName, String newStartDate)
      Changes the start date of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void changeVisibility​(String campName, boolean newVisibility)
      Changes the visibility status of a specified camp owned by this Staff.
      void createCamp​(String campName, String startDate, String endDate, String regClosingDate, boolean visibility, String location, int attendeeSlots, int campComSlots, String description, Faculty openTo)
      Creates a new camp.
      void deleteCamp​(String campName)
      Deletes a camp that was created by this Staff.
      void generatePerformanceReport()
      Generates a performance report for all of this Staff's camps, which includes the points of all the camp committee members involved in the respective camps owned by this Staff.
      void generateStudentReport()
      Generates a student report containing camp details and all registered students and their respective camp roles, for all camps owned by this Staff.
      ArrayList<String> getCampsCreated()
      Creates an array of Strings that contains the names of all the camps created by this staff.
      void initialiseAfterDeserialise​(ICreateCamp staffCampCreator, IDeleteCamp staffCampDeleter, IEditCamp staffCampEditor, IViewAllCamps staffViewAllCamps, IViewOwnCamps staffViewOwnCamps, ISortCamps iSortCamps, IFilterCamps iFilterCamps, IGenerateStudentReport staffStudentReportGenerator, IGetCampsCreated listCampsStaffCreatedGetter, DataList dataList, IGeneratePerformanceReport staffPerformanceReportGenerator)
      Function to initialise the required interfaces after deserialising staff object from storage.
      void viewAllCamps()
      Prints all the camps that the staff can view (In the current implementation, staffs are able to view all camps.)
      void viewOwnCamps()
      Prints details of all the camps created by this Staff.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Staff

        public Staff​(String name,
             String email,
             Faculty faculty,
             ICreateCamp staffCampCreator,
             IDeleteCamp staffCampDeleter,
             IEditCamp staffCampEditor,
             IViewAllCamps staffViewAllCamps,
             IViewOwnCamps staffViewOwnCamps,
             ISortCamps iSortCamps,
             IFilterCamps iFilterCamps,
             IGenerateStudentReport staffStudentReportGenerator,
             IGetCampsCreated listCampsStaffCreatedGetter,
             DataList dataList,
             IGeneratePerformanceReport staffPerformanceReportGenerator)
        Creates a new Staff object, with the given name, associated user database, and interfaces it requires from CampDataBase and RegistrationDataBase.
        Parameters:
        name - This Staff's name.
        email - THis Staff's email.
        faculty - This Staff's faculty.
        staffCampCreator - Interface this Staff uses to create camps.
        staffCampDeleter - Interface this Staff uses to delete camps.
        staffCampEditor - Interface this Staff uses to edit camps.
        staffViewAllCamps - Interface this Staff uses to view all camps.
        staffViewOwnCamps - Interface this Staff uses to view all camps created by him.
        iSortCamps - Interface this Staff uses to sort all the camps in the associated camp database.
        iFilterCamps - Interface this Staff uses to filter all the camps in the associated camp database.
        staffStudentReportGenerator - Interface this Staff uses to generate a student report for all the camps he is in charge of.
        listCampsStaffCreatedGetter - Interface this Staff uses to generate a list of camp names, consisting of all camps he has created.
        dataList - This Staff's associated user databse.
        staffPerformanceReportGenerator - Interface this Staff uses to generate a performance report for all camp committee members of all the camps he is in charge of.

      • createCamp

        public void createCamp​(String campName,
                       String startDate,
                       String endDate,
                       String regClosingDate,
                       boolean visibility,
                       String location,
                       int attendeeSlots,
                       int campComSlots,
                       String description,
                       Faculty openTo)
        Creates a new camp.
        Parameters:
        campName - The Camp's camp name.
        startDate - The Camp's start date.
        endDate - The Camp's end date.
        regClosingDate - The Camp's registration closing date.
        visibility - The Camp's visibility status.
        location - The Camp's location
        attendeeSlots - The Camp's number of attendee slots.
        campComSlots - The Camp's number of camp committee slots.
        description - The Camp's description.
        openTo - The Camp's faculty that it is open to.

      • deleteCamp

        public void deleteCamp​(String campName)
        Deletes a camp that was created by this Staff.
        Parameters:
        campName - Name of camp to be deleted by this Staff.

        public void changeCampName​(String campName,

        newCampName - New camp name.
